Class ec.ui.GatheredListView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----ec.ui.GatheredListView
public class GatheredListView
extends View
implements WindowOwner, Target
Display all gathered objects in a specific category in an IFC view, to allow user to pick a gathered object for inspection by clicking on its button. The GatheredListView displays a button for each gathered object, labeled by its gathered name. The buttons are displayed in a fixed-sized view which will be displayed in a containerview which will be a scrolling area.

performCommand 
  public void performCommand(String command,
                             Object arg)
Perform command; responsibility from Target interface. This gets called when user clicks on one of our gathered-object buttons. The command is just the name of the object.
